content.text: 0) In a large bowl, cream together the margarine and sugar until smooth.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
   :inform ( "cream"@20:25 / AC
      :ppt ( ing-0 "the margarine"@35:48 / FOOD )
      :ppt ( ing-1 "sugar"@53:58 / FOOD )
      :until ( "until smooth"@59:71 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
      :loc ( tool-0-0 "a large bowl"@6:18 / TOOL )
   )
)

content.text: 1) Stir in molasses and egg yolk.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
   :inform ( "Stir in"@3:10 / AC
      :ppt ( ing-2 "molasses"@11:19 / FOOD )
      :ppt ( ing-3 "egg yolk"@24:32 / FOOD )
      :ppt( NULL / FOOD )
   )
)

content.text: 2) Combine the flour, salt, baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon, cloves, ginger, and nutmeg; blend into the molasses mixture until smooth.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Combine"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-4 "the flour"@11:20 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "salt"@22:26 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "baking powder"@28:41 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "baking soda"@43:54 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-8 "cinnamon"@56:64 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-9 "cloves"@66:72 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-10 "ginger"@74:80 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-11 "nutmeg"@86:92 / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-2-1 "blend"@94:99 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "the molasses mixture"@105:125 / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-2-0 "until smooth"@126:138 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Cover, and chill for at least one hour.
4) Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Preheat"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( tool-4-0 "the oven"@11:19 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-4-0 "350 degrees F"@23:36 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-4-1 "175 degrees C"@38:51 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 5) On a lightly floured surface, roll the dough out to 1/4 inch thickness.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "roll"@33:37 / AC
		:loc ( tool-5-0 "a lightly floured surface"@6:31 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( "the dough"@38:47 / FOOD )
		:todo ( "1/4 inch thickness"@55:73 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 6) Cut into desired shapes with cookie cutters.
content.eamr:
( inst-6 / R
	:inform ( ac-6-0 "Cut"@3:6 / AC
		:heat ( tool-6-0 "cookie cutters"@32:46 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:todo ( "desired shapes"@12:26 / OTHER )
	)
)

content.text: 7) Place cookies 2 inches apart on ungreased cookie sheets.
8) Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven, until firm.
content.eamr:
( inst-8 / R
	:inform ( ac-8-0 "Bake"@3:7 / AC
		:duration ( dur-8-0 "8 to 10 minutes"@12:27 / DUR )
		:loc ( tool-8-0 "the preheated oven"@31:49 / TOOL )
		:until ( cond-8-0 "until firm"@51:61 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 9) Remove from cookie sheets to cool on wire racks.
content.eamr:
( inst-9 / R
	:inform ( ac-9-0 "Remove"@-1:-1 / AC
		:source ( tool-9-0 "cookie sheets"@-1:-1 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:prp ( purp-9-0 "to cool on wire racks"@-1:-1 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
	)
)
